title: A New Kind of Ranching Is Taking Its Place at the Ponderosa!

tasks.task: Check the big Joe herd in the burn unit.
subtasks: Verify the big Joe herd's condition.
Distribute hay to the big Joe herd.
Rotate bison to a newly flooded pasture.

tasks.task: Install a mobile chicken coop for wild turkeys.
subtasks: Procure and assemble the mobile chicken coop.
Release and manage wild turkeys in the new mobile unit.
Provide water and feed for the turkeys.

tasks.task: Promote Happy Farmer's mobile chicken coop product.
subtasks: Mention the sponsor (Happy Farmer) in the video.
Encourage viewers to check out Happy Farmer's website.
